name: @rainstormy/preset-eslint-testing-library
description: A predefined, opinionated ESLint configuration suitable for any web project with Testing Library tests.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.eslint-plugin-testing-library: An ESLint plugin that covers Testing Library features in component tests.

devDependencies.@types/eslint: A set of type definitions for ESLint configuration files.
devDependencies.downdoc: Downdoc converts AsciiDoc documents to Markdown to improve compatibility with npm.
devDependencies.typescript: A statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
devDependencies.vite-plugin-dts: A Vite plugin that generates TypeScript declaration files.

peerDependencies.eslint: A static program analysis tool that uncovers code issues.
